content.content: Author: Chuci Qin, Linghao Yang, Qitong Cao Type: Standards Track Category: ERC Created: 2022-11-01 Requires: 165, 721, 1155 Table of Contents  Simple Summary Abstract Motivation Specification Rationale Backward Compatibility Test Cases Implementations References Copyright
content.GPT-summary: The post introduces the EIP-5777 proposal for a Non-Fungible Token - Franchise Standard. The authors provide a simple summary, abstract, motivation, specification, rationale, backward compatibility, test cases, implementations, references, and copyright information. No feedback or questions are asked, but the proposal is explained in detail.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Have you thought about using something like NFT to change the way people work and improve existing management practices?

Absolutely; it’s probably the most exciting part of the challenge of merging technology and moving it forward. I’m sure a train engine must back up in order to connect the compartments it will carry to market. Being said, case studies should benefit these ideas collectively
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
